response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will be an even greater asset to you. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than what many would pay. Considering its true worth and the potential it holds for you, I am offering it to you for $1,150,000. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between the product's value and my desire to ensure you receive a fair deal.

Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed to finalize the transaction. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
